headline: EA Buyout Talk Highlights Gaming Struggles as Growth Slows
summary: A deal, which could be announced as soon as this week,  would continue the trend of consolidation in the industry after Activision Blizzard, maker of the  shooter games, was acquired by Microsoft Corp. two years ago.
